prompt_library.355c88ba:
MODE: STRICT EXECUTION ONLY.
🛑 HARD CONSTRAINTS: The artwork/canvas is the single source of truth; do not alter brushstrokes or colors.
AVOID: glare on canvas, distracting clutter, motion blur, text overlays, low-res, anime, overexposed, neon colors, cartoon, camera shake, harsh flash
📸 SOURCE OF TRUTH: Preserve Text: 'I AM STRONGER', Logo on chest.
🎬 SCENE: Resilience Hoodie, model adjusting hood, modern minimal interior, slow tracking shot
🎨 VIBE: minimal premium streetwear and therapeutic home décor, neutral tones, warm beige, charcoal, soft whites
💡 TECH: soft wrap-around lighting to avoid harsh shadows in the hood area, 50mm Lens
🎯 FOCUS: backprint legibility, heavyweight fabric texture
